title: Oke-Ode: Tragedy as Bandits Kill 15 Vigilantes, Hunters in Kwara
description: Bandits killed 15 vigilantes and hunters on Sunday, September 28, 2025, after invading the Oke-Ode community in the Ifelodun local government area of Kwara State.

title: Again, Bandits Wreak Havoc In Kwara
description: Bandits carried out attacks in Kwara State, resulting in deaths and abductions in various communities.

title: Bandits kill 12 forest guards in Kwara
description: Bandits attacked and killed 12 forest guards in Kwara State, with mobile phone footage showing the bodies on the roadside.

title: Bandits Abduct Businessman In Midnight Attack On Kwara Community
description: Bandits abducted a businessman in a midnight attack on a community in Kwara State.
